content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started, may I please have your full name?
Thanks, John. Could you please provide your address so we can confirm service availability?
Great, John. It looks like you are in our service area. What would be an ideal time for our plumbing technician to visit you?
I'm not sure yet, maybe sometime next week, I guess.
I’m sorry, John, but I didn’t quite catch a specific time. Could you please provide a clearer day and time you'd prefer?
Honestly, I can't commit to a time right now, just let me know when someone can come.
I’m unable to proceed without a specific appointment time. I will escalate this to a human operator for assistance. Someone from our team will reach out to you shortly.
reason: Failed to get clear appointment time from customer
